title: Did Trump Pay $35M to Settle Child Rape Claims Against Him?
subtitle: An "utterly deranged nutter with a mind unclouded by facts, evidence, or reason" may not be the best of sources.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: U.S. President Donald Trump has been the target of multiple accusations that he raped children aged 13 and younger, and he paid at least $35 million to settle most of those claims.
